text: Myristica maingayi is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree found in Sumatra, Peninsular Malaysia and Singapore. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Myristica maingayi. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Myristica maingayi
